channel.title: Music – Tenacious D

item.title: Tenacious D - Tribute
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Tenacious D
KY: 60166 / KY: 21826

This is the greatest
and best song
In the world’s
tribute
Long time ago me and
my brother Kyle here
We was hitchhikin down
a long and
Lonesome road
all of a sudden
There shined
a shiny demon
In the middle of
the road and he said
Play the
best song
In the world
or I’ll eat your soul
Well me
and Kyle
We looked
at each other
And we each
said okay
And we played
the first thing that
Came to
our heads
Just so
happened to be
The best song
in the world
It was the best song
in the world
Look into my eyes and
it’s easy to see
One and one make two
two and one make three
It was destiny
once every
Hundred thousand
years or so
When the sun
doth shine
And the moon
doth glow
And the grass
doth grow
Needless to say
the beast was stunned
Whip crack
went his scrumpy tail
And the beast was done
he asked us
Be you angels
and we said Nay
We are but men rock
ahhh ahhh
Ohhh whoah
whoah
This is not
the greatest song
In the
world no
This is
just a tribute
Couldn’t remember
the greatest song
In the
world no no
This is
a tribute oh
To the greatest song
in the world all right
It was the
greatest song
In the world
all right
Greatest song
in the world all right

And the peculiar thing
is this my friends
The song we sang on
that fateful night
It didn’t
actually sound
Anything like
this song
This is
just a tribute
You gotta believe me
and I wish
You were there
just a matter of
Opinion
ah fuxx
Good God
god lovin
So surprised to find
you can’t stop it
Oh hallelujah
I’m found
Rich muthafuxxer
aaah
All right
all right
